<title level="1" right="Rules">[Magic Wand](/Rules.aspx?ID=3224)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 282 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The simplest form of wand contains a spell, with Price and level based on that spell. The name of a [magic wand](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3050) with a spell in it is simply “wand of,” followed by the spell’s name.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
